data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Aguascalientes, Mexico.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aguascalientes, Mexico
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Aguascalientes hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Aguascalientes, Mexico to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Aguascalientes to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.
Jesus, I pray that all the Japanese people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Japanese people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Japanese people is yours.
Father, help the 108,217 believers in Aguascalientes to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Aguascalientes, Mexico so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Aguascalientes, Mexico. Please, stir the 108,217 believers here to pray for awakening.
